summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Whatcom Avenue, from Railroad Avenue to Hanford Street, and Hanford Street, from Utah Street to Whatcom Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a plank roadway twenty (20) feet in width, thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 509 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," according to, and under provisions of the Laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
